s.text: Chapter 1: We watch as terrorists, sitting on their trawler off the coast of New York, sight in on a jumbo jet, ready, aim, and fire one of those Stingers, blowing the silver tube of humans out of the sky.
convinced us to use their tickets home from Asia on a different airline from the one on which we already were booked.
